title: Readjusting
description:
Henry McMillan, Laura Ford and Sheila Arnold share stories about penile problems, foster parenting, and Black history.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Eko Roosevelt, Laura Ford, Sheila Arnold, Henry McMillan, Stevie Wonder, Taj Easton, Kevin Allison, Disclosure, Danika Smith)
